title: [Neuroscience] Scientists have confirmed that human brains are naturally wired to perform advanced calculations, much like a high-powered computer, to make sense of the world through a process known as Bayesian inference

[Medicine] Scientists present a universal 3d printed epifluidic elastic electronic skin to capture real-time physiological state of individuals during regular daily activities. With machine learning, it is able to predict behavior impairments (reaction time and inhibitory control) after alcohol consumption.
